Example showcasing the brittleness of entailment-based AA. [Mirage]{.smallcaps} correctly finds that the answer cannot be attributed ([[$\varnothing$]{color='brand-color.blue'}]), while NLI and self-citation attribute the lexically similar [Document [3]]{color='brand-color.blue'}.
:::
